0 为 10
1 为 20
2 为 50

LOADI R1 0
LOADI R2 1
LOADI R3 2
ADD R1 R2 R1
BRANCH R0 R1 R3 1 255
STOREI R1 0
HALT

//JUMP 0 //01010100000011000000000000000000

00111000000010000000000000000000

ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R2 R2 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R1 R1 1
STORE R1 R0
ADDI R0 R0 1
BRANCH R2 R1 R2 2 253 

LOADI R0 0
LOADI R1 1
LOADI R2 2
LOADI R3 3
LOADI R4 4
LOADI R5 5
LOADI R6 6
LOADI R7 7
ADD R8 R3 R4
MUL R9 R1 R2
ADD R9 R9 R0
LOADV R0 R1 R2 0
LOADV R3 R4 R5 1
MULV R10
STORE R10 R6
ADD R6 R6 R7
ADD R3 R3 R7
BRANCH R12 R3 R8 2 251
ADD R0 R0 R1
SUB R3 R3 R4
BRANCH R12 R0 R9 2 247
HALT
